issue.title: [Developer] Do not overwrite minor release version with merge script, even if not specified by committer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6915](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6915). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Not every committer knows to write "$MAJOR_VERSION,$MINOR_VERSION" for the fix version when merging

comments.body:
